pages.text: Ã— Book a Tasting & a Tour! Tastings on the hour 12 to 6! Tastings fill up, make sure to book ahead of time! Bottle shop open Wed - Sat 11:30 am to 7pm. We open for special occasions! Email megan@drinkcannon.com to request. Book a Tasting & a Tour Ã— Turn moments into memories! Choose us for your next special occasion or get-together. Got a birthday party, rehearsal dinner, corporate or other event coming up? We're a great option for your gathering! Inquire today and let us know how we can make your special occasion perfect! Book your party 1734 Signal Point Road, Charleston, SC 29412 map marker pin Groups and Parties Let us host your special event! From big to small we can do it all! We provide in-house catering, specialty bar/cocktail options, full production for live entertainment and more! The Rickhouse is your oyster! Book your party Distillery equipment Cannon Distillery Cannon Distillery Cannon Distillery Cannon Distillery Cannon Distillery Cannon Distillery About us is a multi-use distillery and event space that is the home of several local spirits under one umbrella! The Rickhouse @ Cannon Distillery We host everything from weddings, rehearsal dinners, birthday parties, corporate events, live music, cornhole tournaments, crafter markets, Charleston Pickle Fest and much, much more! Please check out our events section and to book your party email megan@drinkcannon.com. Our Products Reviews Google reviews Pete S: They and awesome. Their liquor is TOP NOTCH. Even if liquor isn't your thing, it's still worth checking out. The mixed drinks are creative and well balanced. Don't miss this one. Google reviews TheAngryTeddyXL: Stopped in with my local friends while visiting from out of town. The liquor here is some of the smoothest spirits I've ever had. The atmosphere is wonderful, the tour was informative, and the staff was fantastic! Will visit here everytime I'm in town. Google reviews Brooke H: Cannon distillery has an amazing atmosphere and staff. Most of all, their vodka is the best around. Pour it straight or have it in one of their unique and tasty cocktails. No matter what you won't regret it. Google reviews Jeromy L: Great guys and descriptive on their process. Good bourbon and can't wait until their makes come out. Friends loved the cocktails, I'm a neat person. Great place, will make it back. Google reviews Joshua C: My wife and I stopped in here on our honeymoon and loved the place. Everyone was super helpful, knowledgeable, and easy to talk to. I highly recommend this place if you are in the area. Stop reviews carousel Play reviews carousel Newsletter Location The Rickhouse 1734 Signal Point Road Charleston, SC 29412 Hours Tues 4pm to 10pm Wed thru Sat 11:30 - 10 Bottle Shop: Wed thru Sat 12pm - 7pm Tours & Tastings: 12pm - 6pm on the hour Find us on... Facebook page Instagram page Google page Contact us (843)-437-6127 megan@drinkcannon.com Are you over 21? Yes No

Cannon Distillery Cannon Distillery megan@drinkcannon.com Day Club Party - Sponsored by Early Bird Saturday January 31st Welcome to Day Club â€” the ultimate daytime dance party for the 30+ crowd who still love to party but also love their sleep. Proudly sponsored by Early Bird Vodka! Designed exclusively for the over-30 crowd, Day Club is your chance to relive your glory days without sacrificing your lower back or your brunch plans. We're talking music from the 1980s, 1990s, and early 2000s â€” the soundtrack of your youth, before TikTok dances and when MTV actually played music videos. Learn more at the official website below: Get ready to bust out moves you havenâ€™t attempted since your AIM away message was emotional lyrics from Dashboard Confessional. Local legend DJ Natty Heavy will be spinning the ultimate 80s, 90s, and 2000s hits â€” ranging from Prince and Madonna all the way to Lil Jon and Petey Pablo. All before the sun sets and your kids text asking what's for dinner. Whether you were Team Britney or Team Christina, had a Tamagotchi you forgot to feed, or remember when LimeWire almost destroyed your family computer, Day Club is for you. Come drink, dance, and pretend your knees still work like they did in 2004. This isnâ€™t just a party â€” itâ€™s a time machine with a bar tab. We've got a few ticket options for this event below. ğ†ğ€: Step into the ultimate throwback day party with the Be Kind, Rewind GA ticketâ€”your official pass to a dancefloor filled with shoulder pads, slap bracelets, and songs that still live rent-free in your head. Whether you're voguing to Madonna, belting boy band ballads, or crumping like it's 2005, this ticket gets you: Access to the Day Club dancefloor DJ Natty Heavy spinning all your favorite bangers Nostalgic dÃ©cor, themed photo ops, and pop culture moments that'll make you say, "I totally had that!" No bottle service. No velvet rope. Just the grown-up version of your teenage dreams. ğğšğ›ğ²ğ¬ğ¢ğ­ğ­ğğ« ğğšğœğ¤ğšğ ğğ¬ - Oh yes, these are real. Check out their website below. Dress code is encouraged but not required. Nostalgic flair, cargo pants, butterfly clips, or your finest Saved by the Bell tank are all welcome. Warning: this event may cause spontaneous dance-offs, outdated slang, and overwhelming joy. Get your tickets now before FOMO hits harder than your first hangover at 30. You must bring a valid ID and be 21+ for this event. There is limited free parking at the venue.
